_header: Who that will be holy healthful and rich
_description: Proverbial advice for holiness, health and wealth — one couplet

NottsULMeLm1.Transcription:
Who that wole be holy helful & rycheGo betyme to hys bed &
                    ryse erlyche
NottsULMeLm1.Note: Added by a hand of fifteenth-century.
